item.title: This one unavoidable tax can sink your retirement plan
item.description: How to trim your tax bill when taking RMDs.

item.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
item.description: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive.”

item.title: America once had enough silver to meet its needs. But that’s been outsourced too.
item.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers’ concerns about China’s control of silver and other critical metals used in technology and defense.

item.title: This could be a better — and safer — way into the AI trade in 2026
item.description: Investors might be well served to look beyond semiconductor makers to take part in the AI boom — and more toward the companies that make manufacturing...

item.title: Investors pin hopes on the ‘January barometer,’ with stocks set to skip ‘Santa Claus rally’ for a 3rd year
item.description: For the third straight year, the S&P 500 looks poised to fall during the “Santa Claus rally” period. That has never happened before.
